channel.title: Help with gimp uploading
channel.description: Hey Guys, I made something in GIMP, but idk how to upload it. Everytime I try to do it in photobucket it doesn't work. if anyone could tell me how, I'd really appreciate it. Everytime I save it as some type of file, it saves as a .XCF

item.title: Help with gimp uploading
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Tyvm Javis, it works now. =]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with gimp uploading
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

resave the file as a png file.

go to file>save as>enter the name u want to save it as>click select by file type (by extension)>Scrool down and search for PNG Image (it should be like 21 down). then hit save. Now just go to your uploader and upload it. I use photobucket. but you can use anything you want

Read full topic
